reviewText: I'd seen this on the History Channel a few years back and even taped it but somewhere in time while moving my copy of it was lost. ON the History Channel it didn't include the "Time Machine" part of this, but anyway. A great documentary about the the rise and fall of the counterculture of the late sixties and many key figures and events well worth watching and owning.
Hardly worth paying for. Better to wait until it airs again on History Channel.

Really enjoyed this DVD. Saw program on History channel, was disappointed cause I came into the show about the middle of it. Went to Amazon, and there it was. fast shipping, good price, most of all....took me back to my teen years. covered alot of that Era. I recommend this DVD to anyone, especially those that grew up during this time. Trip down Memory Lane!!
